# Publications

```{r publications}
scholar::get_publications("QbPv1H0AAAAJ") %>%
  dplyr::mutate(author = author %>% as.character() %>% stringr::str_trim(), 
                journal = journal, 
                first_author = dplyr::case_when(stringr::str_starts(author, "L Fabbri") ~ TRUE, 
                                                TRUE ~ FALSE)) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(year)) %>%
  vitae::detailed_entries(
    what = title, 
    when = as.character(year), 
    with = author, 
    where = journal
  )
```
